test-case.name: K-SeqSUMFunc-2

test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `sum((), 3) eq 3`.

test-case.Creator: Frans Englich
test-case.name: K-SeqSUMFunc-4
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `sum((), 3) instance of xs:integer`.

test-case.name: K-SeqSUMFunc-5
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `empty(sum((), ()))`.

test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `sum((), 0.0) instance of xs:decimal`.

test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `sum((), 0.0) eq 0.0`.

test-case.name: K-SeqSUMFunc-8
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `sum(()) eq 0`.

test-case.name: K-SeqSUMFunc-9
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `sum(()) instance of xs:integer`.

test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `sum((-5, -0, -3, -6)) eq -14`.

test-case.name: K-SeqSUMFunc-11
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `string(sum((1, 2, 3, xs:float("NaN")))) eq "NaN"`.
